title: Emigration Police
body: The repressive police for clandestine emigration was created by decree on May 11, 1904. Its personnel consisted of 1 commissioner, 1 secretary, and 6 agents, paid by the General Board, in accordance with the decision made by this corporation on April 23 of the same year.

1904: Year in which the repressive police for clandestine emigration was created.
